item.title: From Zero to Eye Diagram: Building a Full SerDes Model in Minutes with MATLAB
item.description: A practical walkthrough on building a complete SerDes system-level model in MATLAB, including TX FFE, channel effects, RX equalization, and CDR behavior â€” all in a reproducible and simulation-friendly way.
